code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';var initialState={harmonics:[],loading:false,loaded:false,error:''};export var fetchHarmonics=createAsyncThunk('harmonics/fetchHarmonics',function(harmonicsUrl){return axios.get(harmonicsUrl.self).then(function(response){return response.data;});});export var harmonicsSlice=createSlice({name:'harmonics',initialState:initialState,reducers:{},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addCase(fetchHarmonics.pending,function(state){state.loading=true;state.loaded=false;});builder.addCase(fetchHarmonics.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.harmonics=action.payload.HarmonicConstituents;state.loaded=true;state.error='';});builder.addCase(fetchHarmonics.rejected,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.harmonics=[];state.loaded=false;state.error=action.error.message;});}});export default harmonicsSlice.reducer;
